revised_title: The Kinematics of Machines: Analyzing Movement and Machine Design
tldr: The author examines the movements of machines and their components, focusing on the kinematics and design aspects. They analyze the relationships between different types of motions and the geometrical laws governing their associations. By understanding these laws, it is possible to create a method for expressing the constitution of a machine movement and to identify the potential combinations of motions that can be used in machine design.
